intro: Graphic novel about the adventures of a young traveling architect. Discover Bimfli and his friends in this beautiful story full of values and lessons.
description:
In this chapter, Bimfli will travel to Egypt, where he will face various puzzles and must confront multiple traps and challenges to unravel the hidden power of the sundial and its connection to different emblematic places and temples.

·An easy game designed for children.

·Entertaining children's story that is easy to read.

·Learn to read with fun stories in English.

·Cheerful ambient music and sounds based on the culture of each country.

·Learn about monuments, cities, civilizations, geography and architecture.

·Educational content on art history with the recreation of the best painters and architects of each era.

·Learn about the main capitals of the world, as they were in ancient times.

·Adjust accessibility settings such as font height, sound volume and image transition speed.

·Promote diversity and discover multicultural traditions by exploring the world with Bimfli.
